entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
